trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_SEQ_00<tab>As is her wont, Qeshi-Rae wants to discuss the samiel with you.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_TODO_00<tab>Gather information in Lydha Lran.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Qeshi-Rae.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_TODO_02<tab>Search for Mao-Ladd.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_TODO_03<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather a shred of ancient animal skin at Timh Gyeus)) ((Deliver the shred of ancient animal skin to Qeshi-Rae)) /var>.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Qeshi-Rae at the Crystalline Mean.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_SYSTEM_000_900<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must first complete the main scenario quest “Acht-la Ormh Inn.”

TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_000<tab>Yes, this is truly a mystery... We <var 1A 02 /var>know<var 1A 01 /var> that the samiel is out there─it's left plenty of evidence of its passage. So why can't we find it?
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_001<tab><huff> <wheeze> Ch-Chief! We have a problem!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_002<tab>Yalana, you should know better than to run at full tilt! You're an academic─you're liable to kill yourself!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_004<tab>N-Never mind me! It's Mao─he's gone off to Il Mheg to search for the samiel...alone!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_005<tab>He's what!?
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_006<tab>The other researchers, they blamed him for putting the idea of the samiel into your head. “It's because of you she's chasing some fool myth,” they jeered.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_007<tab>Mao couldn't bear their barbs, and in his anger, he rushed off with little more than the clothes on his back!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_008<tab>There's no time to waste! We must find him before he runs afoul of the faeries!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_009<tab>B-But, Chief! What if <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> run afoul of the faeries?
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_010<tab>We'll have <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> with us. <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> has friends among the pixies. Isn't that right?
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_011<tab>I see... Yes, we'd be much assured if you could ask the pixies of Lydha Lran after Mao's whereabouts.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_012<tab>While you see to that, Yalana and I will cast around by the entrance. Come and find us after you've made your inquiries. Now then, let us hurry!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237A_000_020<tab>The man with the big ears? Ooh, yes, I know the one! Was chasing him, as a matter of fact!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237A_000_021<tab>Unfortunately, I lost sight of him west of the lake. If I see him again, I'll turn him into a cute leafman! Tee hee!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237B_000_022<tab>What!? A mortal's come here to play!? Nobody told me that! That's not fair! I'm so bored! Bored, bored, bored! I want to play with him too!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237C_000_023<tab>Hmmm? That mortal's your friend, you say? Had I known that, I would've greeted him with a shove into the lake! Tee hee hee!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_SYSTEM_000_024<tab>It appears Mao-Ladd is somewhere near Longmirror Lake. Time to take word to the others, who await you at Timh Gyeus.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_025<tab>I've only dared set foot in Il Mheg a few times. The place is at once beautiful and terrifying.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_026<tab>Oh, where are you, Mao?
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237A_000_027<tab>I lost sight of the man with the big ears west of the lake.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237A_000_028<tab>If I see him again, I'll turn him into a cute leafman! Tee hee!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237B_000_029<tab>Nobody told me about the mortal! That's not fair! I'm so bored! Bored, bored, bored! I want to play with him too!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237C_100_029<tab>Had I known that mortal was your friend, I would've greeted him with a shove into the lake! Tee hee hee!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_030<tab>There you are. Were you able to learn anything about Mao's whereabouts?
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_031<tab>Truly? Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We could never have located him without your help!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_032<tab>Come, let's make haste to Longmirror Lake. Quickly and quietly does it...
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_035<tab>What were you thinking, lad? You could've been killed, or worse!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_036<tab>He's safe, thank goodness. It's a miracle he managed to come this far unharmed.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_040<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I'm so sorry for all the trouble!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_041<tab>And so you should be! The chief alone is enough of a handful─I can't chase you down as well!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_042<tab>B-But the others, they spoke ill of the chief. I couldn't just stand by and take it.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_043<tab>I know it was reckless of me to come out here alone...but thanks to that, I was able to find an actual part of the samiel!

TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_044<tab>There's...er, just one problem─in my haste, I forgot my tools. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you seem to have yours. Could you do the collecting in my stead?
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_045<tab>Lest you wonder, it's a shred of scaly skin. I spotted it in this area, Timh Gyeus, after noticing rub marks on the trees and rocks.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_050<tab>I spotted the skin in this area, Timh Gyeus, after noticing rub marks on the trees and rocks. Please collect it in my stead.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_052<tab>While droppings can tell us much about a creature, there's no substitute for an actual piece of it. In spite of myself, I'm quite excited, I must admit!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_060<tab>So, did you find the shred of skin?
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_061<tab>Mmm-hmmm! While it's a little on the shriveled side, this is indeed skin from the creature. It was likely molting.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_062<tab>A molting creature! That's one more thing we know about it! I can't wait to see what else this specimen can tell us!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_063<tab>The s-s-samiel! It's b-b-behind you!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_064<tab>Hm? I don't see anything.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_065<tab>Me neither.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_066<tab>Th-That's odd... It was there just a moment ago. And its shape─I'd swear it matches that of the shadow I saw in Amh Araeng.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_067<tab>I don't know how, but it literally disappeared in the blink of an eye.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_068<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you saw it too, didn't you? It wasn't just my imagination?
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_069<tab>Truly!? It was right there, and I missed it!? Gah, of all the rotten luck!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_070<tab>Tell me, what did it look like? What was its color? Smell? Size?

TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_071<tab>Chief, perhaps we should save the questions for after we leave this place. Even with <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, it may not be entirely safe for us here.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_072<tab>Yes, you have the right of it. It wouldn't do to have the faeries get their hands on our precious specimen. Come, let's return to the Crystarium.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_075<tab>Thank you for helping us to find Mao-Ladd. I shudder to think what may have happened to him.
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_076<tab>Anger carried my steps to Il Mheg, but it quickly gave way to terror. I'm in your debt.

TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_080<tab>Well, that was certainly a harrowing outing, but it wasn't without fruit─in the form of a piece of the samiel itself! Ahhh, to feel the scaly texture in my hands and breathe in its mysterious smell... Pure bliss, I tell you!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_081<tab>Alas, Yalana snatched it from me before I could have a little taste...
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_082<tab>Well, for now we'll just have to leave her to her task. I'm sure she'll have new information for us before long, so do not wander far!
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_SYSTEM_000_090<tab>The next request will be available from Qeshi-Rae upon reaching level 78 as a miner or botanist.
